member.name: ID3D11ClassInstance.GetClassLinkage
member.summary: Gets the object associated with the current HLSL class.
member.param: A pointer to a interface pointer.

member.name: ID3D11ClassInstance.GetDesc
member.summary: Gets a description of the current HLSL class.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that describes the current HLSL class.

member.name: ID3D11ClassInstance.GetInstanceName
member.summary: Gets the instance name of the current HLSL class.
member.param: The instance name of the current HLSL class.
The length of the pInstanceName parameter.

member.name: ID3D11ClassInstance.GetTypeName
member.summary: Gets the type of the current HLSL class.
member.param: Type of the current HLSL class.
The length of the pTypeName parameter.

member.name: ID3D11ClassInstance
member.summary: This interface encapsulates an HLSL class.
